description: Updates the description for the host key that's specified by the ServerId and HostKeyId parameters.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the server that contains the host key that you are updating.

parameters.name: HostKeyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the host key that you are updating.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: An updated description for the host key.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: Returns the server identifier for the server that contains the updated host key.

nested_items.name: HostKeyId
nested_items.description: Returns the host key identifier for the updated host key.
